title: Endings Guide
content:
hen lead you to the next choices:

All right. You have my support. This is wrong... but I can't afford to lose you. Do what you must. You want to fight? Fine.

Next, choose the 2nd option so Nightsong will once again, interrupt your conversation with Shadowheart. Nightsong reveals that she knows of the only memory that Shadowheart has. The memory of her being hunted by wolves, and yet, Shadowheart still can't remember what she has lost. Shadowheart still believes that she is meant to become the
